title: Julia: critical moments in teaching (TEFC)
creator_credit: David Gliessman, Don G. Williams, Calvin Productions and United States. Dept. of Health, Education and Welfare
brief_description: Julia, a naturally retiring child, becomes withdrawn in class. The school psychologist tests her and finds she has a hearing impairment. He recommends keeping Julia in her present class. Her teacher is suddenly confronted with the realisation that she has primary responsibility for Julia’s education. What steps should she take to help her?
